Uses of Package
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api

Packages that use org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api These generic DAO interfaces can be used to handle basic DAO operations (save, delete, etc) for persistent objects in an application, choose the one that meets your needs or extend one. 
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.base   
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.hibernate These hibernate based generic DAO implementations can either be used directly to handle persistent object operations in an application or extended to meet more specific needs. 
org.sakaiproject.genericdao.springjdbc These spring jdbc based generic DAO implementations can either be used directly to handle persistent object operations in an application or extended to meet more specific needs. 
 

Classes in org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api used by org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api
BasicGenericDao
          This is a Basic DAO interface which can be used to handle basic DAO CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations for any persistent object.
CoreGenericDao
          This is a generic DAO interface which includes the most fundamental DAO operations (findById, etc) for any persistent object.
GenericDao
          This is a generic DAO interface which includes the most fundamental DAO operations (findById, etc) for any persistent object.
 

Classes in org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api used by org.sakaiproject.genericdao.base
BasicGenericDao
          This is a Basic DAO interface which can be used to handle basic DAO CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations for any persistent object.
GeneralGenericDao
          This is an extensible DAO interface which provides methods that are not dependent on any underlying framework which should meet most needs
GenericDao
          This is a generic DAO interface which includes the most fundamental DAO operations (findById, etc) for any persistent object.
 

Classes in org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api used by org.sakaiproject.genericdao.hibernate
BasicGenericDao
          This is a Basic DAO interface which can be used to handle basic DAO CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations for any persistent object.
CompleteGenericDao
          Deprecated. Use GeneralGenericDao instead
GeneralGenericDao
          This is an extensible DAO interface which provides methods that are not dependent on any underlying framework which should meet most needs
GenericDao
          This is a generic DAO interface which includes the most fundamental DAO operations (findById, etc) for any persistent object.
 

Classes in org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api used by org.sakaiproject.genericdao.springjdbc
BasicGenericDao
          This is a Basic DAO interface which can be used to handle basic DAO CRUD (create, read, update, delete) operations for any persistent object.
GeneralGenericDao
          This is an extensible DAO interface which provides methods that are not dependent on any underlying framework which should meet most needs
GenericDao
          This is a generic DAO interface which includes the most fundamental DAO operations (findById, etc) for any persistent object.
